permissions: Allowed when the user is authorized to create the related project (ProjectEstimateFileImportPolicy delegates create? to the project's policy).
side_effects: Creates a project estimate file import and triggers async processing; when not a dry run, it imports data and can update the related file import record (processed_at, note, raw_data), including PDF extraction data when enabled.
validation_notes: Required flags: --project, --file-import, --file-import-type. file_import_type must be supported for the broker (case-insensitive and normalized to a supported type). file_import must be present and its attachment must be a supported file type; project must be present; broker must be present when file_import is set; import fails if the file attachment is empty.

flags.name: --file-import-type
flags.validation: Required; must be supported for the broker (case-insensitive, normalized).

flags.name: --should-update-file-extraction
flags.description: Update PDF extraction data when importing
